channel.title: Writings on Eirik Berger
channel.description: Recent content in Writings on Eirik Berger

item.description: Project Summery: ‘The Great Norwegian Leveler’ First meeting Oct. 21, 2021. Meeting plan: Oct. 28, 2021 Nov. 4, 2021 Nov. 11, 2021 Nov. 18, 2021 Nov. 25, 2021 Des. 2, 2021 Des. 9, 2021 Des. 16, 2021: Eirik in Norway Zoom information (same log in every week): URL: https://nhh.zoom.us/j/62271490755?pwd=dG9LcVN3VHpqeFdxZkZZeVFNTHhGdz09 Meeting ID: 622 7149 0755 Passcode: 346981 Thursday Oct. 21 (zoom) How we view the project currently: Norwegian income inequality fell dramatically from the onset of the second world war, possibly coming from two main sources:
